text: Bring the family together and enjoy the delicious taste of grilled kofta prepared with Maggi BBQ Seasoning for a quick and simple recipe you can cook in no time!Some of the products used in these recipes are not available for purchase Canada. Therefore we encourage you wherever possible to find local alternative products. Nestlé Canada Inc. does not recommend using Nestlé products not for sale in Canada and is not liable for any injuries related to the purchase and consumption of these products.
